list_definition.definition: a flat, movable, often folding, covered framework for preventing a person etc from being seen, for decoration, or for protection from heat, cold etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Screens were put round the patient’s bed

list_definition.definition: anything that so protects etc a person etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He hid behind the screen of bushes

list_definition.definition: the surface on which films or television pictures appear

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The tall grass screened him from view.

list_definition.definition: to make or show a cinema film

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The film will be screened nationwide.

list_definition.mean_english: nghiên cứu và thẩm tra lí lịch
list_definition.definition: to test for loyalty, reliability etc.

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Women should be regularly screened for cancer.
